title: Star Guardian Invasion Contest distribution complete
body:
# Greetings fellow Star Guardians! 

We have just finished out rolling out the RP prizes to all the Summoners who entered into the [Star Guardian Invasion Contest. ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/JW9EyT1Y-star-guardian-invasion-contest)

We hope you all enjoyed the contest, if you have any feedback feel free to leave it below in the comments. We really enjoy running these events for you all and we already have some planned for the future :D

---

**If you have yet to receive your RP please feel free to contact either myself: "LGC Elam" or "Seras Dragon" through the client.**

From,
The Boards Volunteers of OCE
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: Hi I completed the premade with friends and got an S+ but still haven't gotten the RP

~~Hey man, you were on the list for distribution and your name was correct so you should have received your RP, but I'll give it a sus for you.~~

You should get it with the rest of the corrections :)
Hi, me and my friends got S but none of us got the RP?  I contacted support but I have just been ignored for 4 days.

TY RITO for free RP 

We love you â™¥

Sincerely, the Star Guardians who saved the universe :D
